In England, in the seven days to 02 August, there were 159,587 new confirmed cases (282.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 July, there were 181,727 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 12% (22,140 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 August is 5,278,675 (9,334.5 cases per 100,000 population).
